name: Gloomy forest
description:
Follow your AI companion to the shelter. But avoid monster!

Move with WASD / arrow keys.

Press left mouse button to send your comapanion in a direction you are facing.

Some tips, if you struggle with beating the game.

Your AI companion leads you to your goal.

Moving makes sound, that the monster can hear.

Drone makes less sound than you, and only for a short period of time, when you send him away.

Drone has to come back to you, before he can be sent again

Sometimes it's better to stand still.
